full_text: The economic damage from Covid-19 travel restrictions is piling up, with more companies holding back on large investments or postponing decisions https://t.co/2AWELqhkE6

localize.full_text: Covid-19の渡航制限による経済的ダメージは山積しており、大規模な投資を控えたり、決断を先延ばしにする企業が増えています。https://t.co/2AWELqhkE6
